topics.title: Introduction to Node.js
topics.description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine that allows you to run JavaScript on the server side. It uses an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model that makes it lightweight and efficient. Node.js is perfect for building scalable network applications and has a rich ecosystem of packages available through npm.

topics.title: Express.js Framework
topics.description: Express.js is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for web and mobile applications. It facilitates rapid development of Node.js based web applications and provides a thin layer of fundamental web application features, without obscuring Node.js features.

topics.title: Database Integration
topics.description: Learn how to integrate various databases with Node.js applications. Explore both SQL databases like PostgreSQL and MySQL, as well as NoSQL databases like MongoDB. Understand database connection patterns, query optimization, and best practices for data modeling and management in Node.js applications.
